title: Dress Fabric, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: Jacquard woven, predominantly warp-faced plain weave (white) with discontinuous supplementary wefts (multicolor) floating from face to face.
dimensions:
H x W (Loomed width): 67.9 cm (26 3/4 in.)
H x W: 33.5 x 67.5 cm (13 3/16 x 26 9/16 in.)
description: Pattern of offset rows of polychrome flowers on an ivory ground. Rows of flowers facing alternately left and right. Warp face plain weave foundation with discontinuous supplementary weft floating alternately from face to face.

tombstone.epitaph:
Dress Fabric, 19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: Jacquard woven, predominantly warp-faced plain weave (white) with discontinuous supplementary wefts (multicolor) floating from face to face.. 1972-81-25.
